Package peregrine.http

A new and cleaner HTTP client that doesn't require an extra queue and uses isWritable correctly.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
HttpClient General functionality across all HTTP methods.
HttpClientHandler Listen to messages and handle the state of the client.
HttpClientPipelineFactory  
HttpClientRuntime Backend runtime for the HTTP client including netty bootstrap and Executors.
HttpClientWriter A HTTP client that supports writing to the stream.
HttpDeleteMethod HTTP DELETE method.
HttpGetMethod HTTP GET method.
HttpHeadMethod HTTP GET method.
HttpPostMethod Client for performing an HTTP post.
HttpPutMethod Client for performing an HTTP post.
HttpTrackingLatch TrackingLatch but throws HttpClientException with the current state.
HttpTrackingLock  
HttpWriteForwardWriter HTTP PUT implementation that uses write forwarding to also write data to secondary hosts.
 

Exception Summary
HttpClientException  
 

Package peregrine.http Description

A new and cleaner HTTP client that doesn't require an extra queue and uses isWritable correctly.
